radiographic_examinations.findings: Limited visualization of the left hepatic lobe; liver is diffusely echogenic with smooth contour; no focal liver mass; patent portal vein with hepatopetal flow; no ascites; moderate gallbladder distension; single calculus in the neck of the gallbladder; gallbladder wall thickening; pericholecystic fluid; possible accessory spleen noted in the left upper quadrant; no hydronephrosis in the kidneys.
